page.title: 05DONNA'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Friday morning,school 'YUK',as soon as I got to school the buzzer went (schoolbell).Quickly I went into the classroom where I saw Rachael White sitting on a chair giggling to herself, I asked her what the joke was she replied "Darren T. did an enormous burp,".While we were still laughing, Mrs.Wells walked in and threatened us Then Mrs.Wells asked Samantha and Jenny to give out the maths books! Suddenly someone burst out laughing it was Martin Hunt he was looking through a plastic camera Rachael poked me in the ribs and said,"Whats going on?"I replied,"Theres some rude pictures in that camera."Rachael then asked "who's camera is that?" "Clive Andrew's"I said.Mrs. Wells suddenly shouted"BE QUIET".In the afternoon we did some sewing, at the end of school I said to Rachael "See you on Monday".
